availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Carrollton, Carroll County, Kentucky in 1860; Carroll County, KY in 1863
Biography: Laborer (in 1860 census). Retail dealer (in 1863 U.S. IRS tax assessment list). Not listed on 1850 or 1860 slaveholder census schedules.

bibl.p:
Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 72.
U.S. IRS Tax Assessment List, Carroll County, KY, 1863, Series M768, Roll 15, Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866; (National Archives Microfilm Publication M768, 24 rolls); Records of the Internal Revenue Service, Record Group 58; The National Archives at Washington, D.C.
